faq.title: Pricing FAQs
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about packages and pricing

q1.question: Are there any setup fees or hidden costs?
q1.answer: No! The displayed price is all-inclusive. There are no setup fees, activation fees, or other hidden costs. You only pay the monthly/yearly subscription according to your chosen package.

q2.question: How does the 7-day free trial work?
q2.answer: Click the 'Start 7-Day Free Trial' button on your desired package. You'll get full access to all features of that package for 7 days without needing to enter a credit card. After the trial ends, you can decide whether to continue the subscription or not.

q3.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
q3.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. For upgrades, the price difference will be prorated based on your remaining billing period. For downgrades, changes will take effect in the next billing period.

q4.question: What payment methods are available?
q4.answer: We accept payments via Bank Transfer (BCA, Mandiri, BNI, BRI), Virtual Account, QRIS, Credit/Debit Card, and E-Wallet (OVO, GoPay, Dana). For annual subscriptions, we also provide 0% installment options.

q5.question: Is there a discount for annual payments?
q5.answer: Yes! You get a 20% discount when choosing annual billing. For example, the Professional package normally costs Rp 499K/month, if paid annually it's only Rp 399K/month (total Rp 4,788K/year, saving Rp 1,200K!).
